text:
Dear Alan there are few questions.

Could you describe your job please?

How did you get into the VFX industry?

Do you think what kind of skills or experience can help me to get a job in VFX?

Could describe a typical day in Framestore?

What kind of responsibility do you have in terms of Visual effects supervisor in Framestore?

Do you have any tips and tricks which can help me to improve in 3D environmental design?

Usually how many hours a day you're working?

How do you keep your life balance between your job and family?

thank you very much.
